Detailed Description

Animation represents 2d sprite animation storage class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

~Animation (   ) 
 

Animation class destructor.

Free all memory used to store sprite animation data. Please note any sprite transform frames will be not deleted.

Member Function Documentation

Bool ExportNode (  GameData *  gd,
SVector< SpriteTransform > *  st_table,
SVector< CustomData > *  cd_table,
Char **  tokens
) 
 

Exports animation from current node of GameData class object.

Parameters:
gd pointer to GameData class object.
st_table pointer to SVector class object. All exported SpriteTransform class objects will be created in this unmovable vector. Animation class object will be store only pointers on it.
cd_table pointer to SVector class object. All exported CustomData class objects will be created in this unmovable vector.
tokens pointer to ASCII names identifications for CustomData class objects tokens.
Returns:
Return True if export success else False.

SpriteTransform** Find (  const Char *  ani_name  ) 
 

Find specified animation by ASCII name.

Parameters:
name_ pointer to ASCII name for specified animation .
Returns:
Return pointer to array of SpriteTransform class objects if find complete successfully else NULL pointer.
